top-content.text-1: I am an enthusiastic web developer dedicated to creating stunning and user-friendly web-applications.
top-content.text-2: The main advantage of Angular is its dynamic nature.
top-content.text-3: I worship the flexibility and power of JavaScript, and the robustness of TypeScript.

bottom-content.text-1: I'm a web developer who thrives on working with top-notch web technologies like Angular, JavaScript, and TypeScript, along with other tools. My passion for creating user-friendly web applications grows stronger every day. By combining my expertise in web development with a deep understanding of user needs, I create web applications that not only achieve business objectives but also leave every user delighted.
bottom-content.text-2: I've worked with a variety of technologies like Angular, RxJS, NgRX, JavaScript, TypeScript, Firebase, TailwindCSS, Bootstrap 5, Angular Material, Stripe, and React. I also have a deep understanding of internet protocols such as HTTP/HTTPS and practical knowledge of back-end programming, for example, in NodeJS.
bottom-content.text-3: This broad experience enables me to handle various development tasks efficiently and effectively.

workingExperience.title: Working experience
workingExperience.noExperience: For now, I don’t have any experience, but I’m looking forward to get it!
